hero.title: Interest Protocol Liquidity Program
hero.paragraph: We are excited to introduce the Interest Protocol Liquidity Rewards Program, the first of its kind in the Sui ecosystem. This program is designed to incentivize individuals who contribute to the growth and stability of our platform, allowing them to earn extra income on their crypto holdings. Participants have the opportunity to grab a share of 28M IPX tokens which are distributed in to 3 different types of activities that you can take part in: Provide Liquidity, Swap Assets and complete Zealy social activities.

firstThingFirst.title: How to bridge assets to the Sui blockchain
firstThingFirst.subtitle: First things First
firstThingFirst.description: If your assets are on other chains you need to bridge them to the Sui Blockchain. Here is how you do it.

then.title: Then...
then.description: To participate in the Liquidity Rewards Program, follow these steps:

steps.1: If you are reading this, you have completed the first step! Congrats you have landed at our Liquidity Program Hub. You are one step closer to start winning!
steps.2: Provide Liquidity in to our Liquidity Pools to acquire LP tokens. The more you provide, higher the reward!
steps.3: Deposit your LP Tokens to our Farms to start farming aIPX Tokens (Airdrop Interest Protocol Tokens)
steps.4: Swap aIPX token for IPX 1:1 after TGE.

description.paragraph1: Interest Protocol supports four primary pools - SUI/USDC, SUI/ETH, SUI/BTC and USDC/USDT. As a liquidity provider, you can choose any of these pools to provide liquidity.
description.paragraph2: We have allocated 25 Million tokens to be farmed by liquidity providers, and each pool will assigned the following number of tokens:

suiEth.title: SUI∙ETH
suiEth.available: 35% - 8,750,000 aIPX tokens available to be farmed.

suiUSDC.title: SUI∙USDC
suiUSDC.available: 20% - 5,000,000 aIPX tokens available to be farmed.

suiBTC.title: SUI∙BTC
suiBTC.available: 35% - 8,750,000 aIPX tokens available to be farmed.

udscUSDT.title: USDC∙USDT
udscUSDT.available: 10% - 2,500,000 aIPX tokens available to be farmed.

informations.first: Once you have invested in any of the Liquidity Pools you will start farming aIPX tokens.
informations.second: The airdrop will be given to the address that was deposited while adding the liquidity.
informations.warning: Additionally, as a liquidity provider, you will earn 0.3% of all trading fees generated by the pool in proportion to your share of the pool.

card1.title: 5M IPX Tokens
card1.subtitle: for Swapping on our DApp
card1.description: Whenever you trade tokens, you also qualify to get a share of a 5 Million tokens pool, the more Swaps you do the higher your chances to get a better reward.

card2.title: 3M IPX Tokens
card2.subtitle: for participating on our <link>Zealy</link>
card2.description: If you complete any Zealy activity you accumulate XP, thereafter you are qualified to grab a share of 3M IPX Tokens. the more XP you get higher your chances to get a better reward.

sentence.first: Please note that you can enter the campaign between
sentence.second: The rewards will be distributed after one week after the campaign ends.

distributionList.option1: Rewards will be assigned to the wallet addresses you used to provide liquidity and make swaps.
distributionList.option2: Zealy reward winners will be requested to provide their wallets at the end of the campaign

simplicity.title: SIMPLE & EASY
simplicity.description: Easy to participate for both experts and novices

support.title: QUICK SUPPORT
support.description: We're here 24/7 to respond to your queries

reward.title: TOP REWARD
reward.description: Among the best rewards in the industry

newsletter.title: STAY UPDATED
newsletter.description: If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to reach out to us. We look forward to seeing you join our Liquidity Rewards Program!

footer.title: Follow us
footer.description: Stay tuned for our latest updates and announcements. Follow us on socials.
